metadata.description:
Welcome to the world of Huxley.  Dive into the epic saga a decade in the making.  The first of six issues.

On a routine scavenging mission into the wastelands, Max and Kai uncover an ancient robot that could change their fortunes.....the discovery does not go unnoticed.

Head over to https://huxleysaga.com/comics/issue-1/gold/1 to i) download the full digital version free of charge by the token owner, ii) redeem the physical comic, and iii) check to see if this issue has been redeemed yet.
metadata.name: HUXLEY Comic: Issue 1 - Gold #1
